data.title: Efficient
data.text:
Word of mouth sent me here. I was not expecting standing in a line that wrapped the building outside. I expected to wait 30 min  in line but only spent 8 to order. Waited 20 for food. The customer service is great. Although the place is busy, it is managed well, and provides scrumptious food.
I definitely recommend anyone to come here and grab a cuban sandwich/plate, dessert, cake, cafe con leche. Lets jus say I came for a sandwich and walked out with 3 bags of food, sweets, and a cafe😆.
I will be back

data.title: The pastries are out of this world
data.text: If you go here you need to plan to stand in line for awhile. We have only gotten their pastries. It is hard to decide what to get because there are so many things to choose from. You want to buy a huge box full because everything looks so good.

data.title: Always a pleasure to eat and buy pastries here.
data.text: The pastries, cakes, and lunches are really delicious. We keep going back at least every two months. The personnel are very nice, efficient and professional. Even though its super packed, the lines move quickly.

data.title: You can never go wrong with this place
data.text: Everything I have eaten or drank here is great.  I have had cuban sandwiches, guava pastries, many other pastries and coffee.  I have never had a bad experience in this place.  The service is great and the place is always clean.  If you have never been here you need to go.

data.title: Long line... It's Worth it!!!
data.text: If anyone has ever seen Cake Boss and they always show the bakery EXTREMELY busy....yeah that's this place!!!! Went at 6:45a.m., this place was already hopping!!! Let me tell you, their cakes and food speaks for themselves....a must visit if you are in the area!!!!! Just go early and prepare to wait!!!

data.title: Bakery with specialty from Cuba
data.text: We have only been here one time but we come back whenever we are in this area. Many people were waiting in lines to place their orders but they have a good system for short waiting times.They sell pastries, cakes, coffees, sandwiches and soup.

data.title: One of the best bakeries
data.text:
I have only been here twice but I come back whenever I am in the area.  You know a bakery is popular when there are lines of people waiting to place their orders.  They sell pastries, cakes, coffees and sandwiches.  I personally think the guava strudels are the best pastry I have ever eaten.  I also enjoy their mango turnovers and beef empanadas.  

Go early and go often.

data.title: Excellent place
data.text: Great place to go with family and friends, great costumer service and fast.. Nice/clean place.. Can't wait to go again

data.title: Delicious option for a reasonable prices
data.text: I ate dinner (and desert!) at Porto's and it was fresh, tasty and had decent portions. Had to wait about 10 mins in the line, on a weekday, but it was worth it.

data.title: WOW - Everything in here is "fantastico"...
data.text: I am not the only one that thinks that this place "rocks". Every time I go, there is a line that goes from the door all the way around the plaza. All items are tasty and fresh. The coffee bar is just incredibly good, better than the "star people"..LOL. I also like the fact that the prices are very reasonable for the quality of the food you get. You must try this place.

data.title: Wuman
data.text: Oh my God that is  the best place ever ..the people make line to buy their said it wordthe time we spend to grab what we like 24/ 7 it full of people

data.title: Cuban Cuisine
data.text: I love this place! The lines are long, but the friendly staff is there to help organize what appears to be controlled chaos. As you move through the line desserts are sitting in the display case waiting on your admiration and adornment to see which will be picked like a puppy in a pet store, but much more delicious. The potato balls and meat-pies are rich and delicious. The coffee is brewing and it just smells like sugar and spice and everything nice. This place is a MUST!

data.title: always a zoo so be prepared to line up
data.text: this bakery is known for cheeserolls, cakes and cuban desserts and sandwiches. they also have a drink selection that can rival any good coffee shop.  It's always a wait to buy your items but the line moves fairly fast. they have the crowd control and lines down to a science. Worth the wait for anything in this place

data.title: Downey Locale
data.text: This establishment is in the right place. The service is awesome. The food will keep you coming back for more and more. I love this place.

data.title: Excellent Pastries
data.text: Such a wonderful place to try Cuban pastries. With such a huge assortments of delicious beautifully decorated cakes, cookies and freshly baked goods it's hard to not to order several different types of goodies. Definitely try their Guava cookies, Dulce dr Leche cookies, and their Potato meat balls.

data.title: Amazing Food
data.text: Usually stop by here for their desserts. Tried one of their sandwiches for the first time and it was amazing! Will definitely try more food next time I visit.

data.title: Amazing Food
data.text: The best bakery type food at an affordable price, the bread is amazing, eat the Potato Balls and Croquetas for a tasty Cuban treat, its worth the wait

data.title: First time here..
data.text:
This was our first time in Downey. We saw long lines and decided to check it out.
Took us almost 1 hour to finish our shopping.

After eating the pastries we realized it was worth the wait. Awesome pastries. Well priced.

Tip: plan your trip and buy it

data.title: Good food, reasonable prices, crowded
data.text: Great, reasonably priced food. Be prepared to wait in line 15-20 minutes to order. As long as you have the time, this is a good place to go!

data.title: Always a must stop!
data.text: This place is a super must stop. This Cuban bakery/cafe is so delicious that you need to get ready for the long line BUT don't get discouraged, the line goes fast. From all the pastries, sweet or savory and all the food is delicious , no wonder it is always packed with people. The meat pies are so good you might want to buy a dozen. The potato balls are so good and crunchy. The empanadas ...it doesn't matter if you choose the sweet or savory ones, the are all good. You won't regret stopping by.
